protein.general_function: Involved in G-protein coupled receptor protein signaling pathway
protein.specific_function: Receptor for the lysosphingolipid sphingosine 1- phosphate (S1P). S1P is a bioactive lysophospholipid that elicits diverse physiological effect on most types of cells and tissues. Is coupled to both the G(i/0)alpha and G(12) subclass of heteromeric G-proteins. May play a regulatory role in the transformation of radial glial cells into astrocytes and may affect proliferative activity of these cells

go_class.description: lysosphingolipid and lysophosphatidic acid receptor activity
cell surface receptor linked signaling pathway
g-protein coupled receptor protein signaling pathway
